name: olio.llm.promptTemplate
label: Prompt Template
description: Structured prompt template with composable, conditional sections, ordering, and inheritance.

fields.name: extends
fields.description: Name of a parent template to inherit sections from. Resolved at compose time.

fields.name: sections
fields.description: Ordered list of composable template sections

fields.name: sectionOrder
fields.description: Explicit ordering of section names for composition. If empty, sections are composed in list order.

fields.name: role
fields.description: Default role this template targets (system, user, assistant)
